sentences.en: Everything he writes demonstrates the depth of his sensibility.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的一切都显示出他深深的感悟。

sentences.en: He was by nature powerful of thought and sensibility.
sentences.cn: 他生来富于思想和感情.

sentences.en: He was unable to control his sensibility.
sentences.cn: 他不能控制自己的过分敏感。
她的感情之强简直是超乎寻常!

sentences.en: His desertion had wounded sensibility far below the surface of her pride.
sentences.cn: 他对她的疏远挫伤了比自尊心深得多的情感.

sentences.en: It exercised a powerful influence upon the sensibility of the age.
sentences.cn: 这对当时读者的感官自有很大的影响.

sentences.en: It heightened her sensibility and armoured her apart.
sentences.cn: 它提高了她的感受性,同时又把她团团围住和一切隔离开来.

sentences.en: It'sharpened the poetic sensibility of two generations.
sentences.cn: 它提高了两代人对诗的敏感力.

sentences.en: Language sensibility is the ability to be sensitized to language.
sentences.cn: 语感是对语言的敏感性以及对语言的感悟能力.

sentences.en: Marianne, emotional and sentimental, is the embodiment of sensibility.
sentences.cn: 脆弱易感又情感丰沛的玛莉安娜, 是感性的化身.

sentences.en: Sensibility, as far as concerned the yearning for food, had been exhausted.
sentences.cn: 他已经丧失了想吃食物的感觉.

sentences.en: So horrible was it that sensibility awoke long enough to be shocked.
sentences.cn: 脸色之可怕,竟然使他一时恢复了知觉,感到震惊了.

sentences.en: The weather effect the sensibility of some people fiercely.
sentences.cn: 天气能很强烈地影响一些人的情感.

sentences.en: These are men of great sensibility as well as analytical ability.
sentences.cn: 这些人的感性极高,分析能力也强.

sentences.en: They left his presence with admiration for his'sensibility ".
sentences.cn: 他们一离开他时,都赞叹他的 “ 敏感 ”.

words.tran_cn: 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的
敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的
明显地；容易感知地；聪明地
感觉，官能；观念；道理；理智
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人
情感；敏感性；感觉；识别力

trans.tran_cn: 情感，敏感性，灵敏度，感觉，感性，感光性，感光度
trans.tran_en: the way that someone reacts to particular subjects or types of behaviour
